project_descr: SUPPORT TO MINISTRY OF ENERGY AND POWER AND NATIONAL POWER AUTHORITY

donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr:
To contribute to the revenue base of the government, which ideally will help to raise capacity of national institutions to support poverty reduction programmes. This support follows the end of the World Bank support to the Emergency Power Initiative in September 2008. 
Key outputs include
1. Seamless provision of electricity in Freetown for the intervening months ideally until the beginning of operations of the Bumbuna hydro-electric plant.

2. Improved power generation in Bo and Kenema from 0.5MW to 5MW by rehabilitating a generator in Bo-Kenema Power Services (BKPS).

3. Increased and sustained power generation for Freetown from 25MW to 31 MW by rehabilitating a generator in Kingtom Power Station.

4. Enhanced operational efficiency and capacity of the Ministry of Energy and Power (MEP), National Power Authority (NPA) and BKPS.

project_title: pbf- emergency support to the energy sector
